#!/bin/bash
sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install httpd -y
cd /var/www/html/
sudo systemctl start httpd
git config --globlal user.name James
git config --globlal user.email jamesmichaellacson@gmail.com
git clone https://github.com/JamesMichaelLacson/101kittenclway.git
cd 101kittenclway
mv * ../
sudo crontab -l > gitPull
echo '30 * * * * ~/autoGitPull.sh' >> gitPull
sudo crontab gitPull
sudo touch ~/autoGitPull.sh
sudo touch ~/log.txt
sudo chmod 777 ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo '#!/bin/bash' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'cd /var/www/html/101kittenclway' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'mv * ../' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'git pull origin master' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'sudo systemctl restart httpd' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'TODAY=$(date)' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'HOST=$(hostname)' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'echo ----------------------------------- >> ~/log.txt' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'echo Date-$TODAY >> ~/log.txt' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'echo HOST-$HOST >> ~/log.txt' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'echo ----------------------------------- >> ~/log.txt' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'echo git_command_attempted >> ~/log.txt' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
echo 'sudo reboot' >> ~/autoGitPull.sh
sudo systemctl enable httpd
